A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought this movie was really good to me and introduce new ideas to the Starwars universe that haven't been seen since the original trilogy it wasn't a perfect movie but no movie is my favorite Star Wars movie is still The Empire Strikes Back but this is a close second there were some issues such as with the plot that you'll hear people talk about but the best part about a Star Wars movie in my opinion is being able to use your imagination to fill in the gaps which is what I did but overall when it comes to a Star Wars movie when the parts come that aren't wine glowing if they can keep me entertained during the less interesting parts then you have a great movie which is what we have here and I hope people's opinions change over time and just enjoy the movie
